meanings.sent3: She punts the ball playfully to her friend in the park.

meanings.definition: To make a bet without any certainty of the outcome.

meanings.sent2: He punts on the lottery ticket hoping to win big.
meanings.sent3: She punts on her favorite team winning the championship.
